'''''Die, or Go Parry II''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series X]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Lord of Eroded Primal Fire]] when the battlefield has been reduced to its smallest size.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The arena is reduced in size after the Lord of Eroded Primal Flame uses Abyssal Rain, which will only be used for a total of 3 times.
